item.description:
What if you could feel like you’re in love EVERY DAY of your life? And what if you could dissolve any heartache, pain, or emptiness and experience the joy of living with an open heart?

You can. In my workshop I will show you how to experience a deep and lasting state of love that doesn’t depend on another person, situation, or
romantic partner. You’ll be able to:

o Open your heart and become a magnet for love

o Enjoy more fulfilling relationships with others AND yourself

o Turn off your body’s stress response and turn on your body’s love response for better health and well-being

o Experience more success and satisfaction

o Help your family, community, and the world

With Olga Kaminsky, RMT, RYT

Saturday, May 18, 2:00 – 4:00pm

$20
item.name: Love Your Life Fully
